Html:
Hi,

I'm try to change ABNT_Num and need help to translate pages and  want change font of author.

[4] Стефанов, Г.; Кремакова, Б. Строителни свойства на българските льосови почви. София. Техника. 1960. 220 p.

[5] SARSBY, R. Environmental Geotechnics. London. Thomas Telford. 2000. 584 p. ISBN 0-7277-2752-4.

  to

[4] Стефанов, Г.; Кремакова, Б. Строителни свойства на българските льосови почви. София. Техника. 1960. 220 c.

[5] Sarsby, R. Environmental Geotechnics. London. Thomas Telford. 2000. 584 p. ISBN 0-7277-2752-4.

The p. doesn't get there automatically, it's a string. From your example in your other post: { %Pages::% p.} you could just type { %Pages::% c.} . If you want internationalization out of the box (one style for multiple languages), then that is not possible with BibWord. This was a specific design choice.

What format string are you using for your authors? Check Formatting a Set of Contributors for general information on things you can change to format a set of contributors. Also check the example contributor format strings , they give you a basic idea of the possibilities of formatting a single name.
